description: Your vitality depends on your temperature; at higher temperatures, you are more lively. At lower temperatures, you are more torpid.
leveltext: Your base quickness score is reduced by 10.
Your quickness increases as your temperature increases and decreases as your temperature decreases.
description_ko: 생명력이 체온에 달려 있습니다. 높은 온도에서는 더 활기차지만, 낮은 온도에서는 느려집니다.
leveltext_ko: 체온이 높아질수록 신속성이 증가하고 낮아질수록 감소합니다.
